doc:
Tony Goldwyn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Goldwyn 0 Anthony Howard "Tony" Goldwyn (born May 20, 1960) is an American actor, singer, producer, director and political activist. He portrayed Carl Bruner in Ghost, Colonel Bagley in The Last Samurai, and the voice of the title character of the Disney animated film Tarzan. He starred in the ABC legal/political drama Scandal, as Fitzgerald Grant III, President of the United States from 2012 to 2018. Anthony_Howard_"_Tony_"_Goldwyn ( born May_20_,_1960 ) is an_American_actor , singer_,_producer_,_director_and_political_activist . He portrayed Carl_Bruner in Ghost , Colonel_Bagley in The_Last_Samurai , and the_voice of the_title_character of the_Disney_animated_film_Tarzan . He starred in the_ABC_legal/political_drama_Scandal , as Fitzgerald_Grant_III , President of the_United_States from 2012 to 2018 .
